" SunTrust to buy National Commerce Financial". Atlanta Business Chronicle ( 9 May 2004).
Barbash, Fred (July 16, 2004). " Riggs Bank Sold to PNC Financial Services Group", Washington Post.
Capital One Financial Corporation (Nov. 16, 2005). " Capital One Completes Acquisition of Hibernia Corporation".
Wachovia ( 12 September 2005). " WACHOVIA CORPORATION TO ACQUIRE WESTCORP AND WFS FINANCIAL INC IN $3.91 BILLION TRANSACTION". Press release.
Capital One Financial Corporation (December 1, 2006). " Capital One Completes Acquisition of North Fork Bancorporation".
Wachovia Corporation (May 7, 2006). " Wachovia to Acquire Golden West Financial".
Eric Dash and Andrew Ross Sorkin (September 26, 2008). " Government Seizes WaMu and Sells Some Assets", New York Times.
David Ellis (October 3, 2008). " Wachovia: Wells in, Citi out", CNN Money.
Stephen A. Rhoades, "Bank Mergers and Industrywide Structure, 1980-1994," Washington: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, January 1996. ( Staff study 169)
Steven J. Pilloff, "Bank Merger Activity in the United States, 1994-2003," Washington: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, May 2004. ( Staff study 176)
Institute of Mergers, Acquisitions and Alliances (MANDA) M&A An academic research institute on mergers & acquisitions, including bank mergers
